description:
Your daily routine can earn you free gift cards to popular retailers like Amazon. Here are simple ways you can set your reward accumulation on autopilot.
Did you know there are dozens of ways to get free Amazon gift cards?

It may sound like a scam, but itâ€™s not. There are plenty of ways to get free gift cards to many other retailers as well.

Companies often offer these rewards as an incentive for users to complete small tasks. For example, you can earn free gift cards by completing online surveys, playing games, or for the shopping you already do. In return, these companies get data on consumer behavior or, in some cases, a percentage of the money you spend with certain retailers.

So while you still have to do something to unlock these free Amazon gift card codes, all of these tasks require minimal time and effort.You wonâ€™t get rich doing paid online surveys â€” there are much better ways to make money online â€” but you can use them to earn free Amazon gift card codes in your spare time if you canâ€™t find a better option. For each site below, youâ€™ll need to create a free account in order to unlock the gift cards. Some sites offer sign-up bonuses for new members which you can exchange for Amazon gift card codes.

For each site you decide to use, be sure to fill out your profile completely and answer the qualifying questions as accurately as possible. That way youâ€™ll get matched with relevant surveys and spend less time answering pre-survey questions only to be disqualified.You wonâ€™t get a penny for using Google as your default search engine, but with Microsoft Rewards youâ€™ll get points for every search you do on Bing. If youâ€™re like us and have to look up multiple things every single day, this will eventually add up.
